entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:20AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A WINTRY MIX OF PRECIPITATION EXPECTED ACROSS THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA AND MIDDLE KUSKOKWIM VALLEY THIS WEEKEND... Low pressure over eastern Russia will advance a front across Southwest Alaska Saturday. Precipitation is expected to develop along the coast Saturday morning and move over the interior of the Kuskokwim Delta and Middle Kuskokwim Valley Saturday

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:18AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated water levels along the West Coast Sunday and Monday... A strong weather system moving to the West Coast will bring elevated water levels to the coast south of the Bering Strait Sunday night and Monday and north of the Bering Strait on Monday.
